title: ITaperedTapElementData.EndConditionOverride
description: Gets or sets whether to override the end condition of this tapered tap hole element.
returns: True to override the end condition, false to not (see Remarks )
remarks:
This property can be set only if
IAdvancedHoleFeatureData::UseBaselineDimensions
is set to false.
Set this property to true and specify
IAdvancedHoleElementData::EndCondition
to override the end condition.
